headline: Better Artificial Intelligence Stock: BigBear.ai vs. Palantir
summary: Two businesses to consider are BigBear.ai (NYSE: BBAI) and Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR).  President Donald Trump's administration is determined to see the U.S. lead the world in artificial intelligence.  This puts BigBear.ai and Palantir in a position to benefit from the government's AI spending.

headline: 2 Millionaire-Maker Technology Stocks to Buy
summary: When it comes to looking for millionaire-making tech stocks, your best bet is to try to find small to mid-sized growth companies that have big potential.  While these type of investment gains do occur, they are very rare.  With a $200 billion market cap, Palantir (NASDAQ: PLTR) would have to become a $20 trillion company in the next 20 to 30 years for an investor to turn $10,000 into $1 million.

headline: Palantir Stock vs. Nvidia Stock: Wall Street Says Buy One Before It Soars 50%
summary: Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) and Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) are two of the most widely held stocks among retail investors.  Palantir has a consensus "hold" rating among the 26 analysts who follow the company.  The median target price of $97 per share implies 7% upside from its current share price of $91.
